thread.title: Networking event seeks to foster more relationships within arts community
thread.title_full: Networking event seeks to foster more relationships within arts community

title: Networking event seeks to foster more relationships within arts community
text:
Networking event seeks to foster more relationships within arts community October 15, 2015 Last updated: Thursday, October 15, 2015, 1:20 AM The Record Print 
ART: Networking serieslaunches at bergenPAC 
The Northern New Jersey Community Foundation and ArtsBergen will launch Connect the Dots, a four-event networking series beginning 6 p.m. Monday at the Bergen Performing Arts Center, 30 N. Van Brunt St. in Englewood. The free events seek to foster relationships within the county’s arts community. It is open to Bergen County artists, art supporters, art administrators, community leaders and business owners. Monday’s discussion centers on how communities are currently using creative place-making and how this process can be used in their public spaces. Space is limited. Preregistration is required online at nnjcf.org. Information: 201-568-5608. 
— Rebecca Rosenthal © 2015 North Jersey Media Group Tags:
